neuro flirts ith mega: Neuro attempts to flirt with Megalodon
neuro threatens mega: Neuro threatens Megalodon in some way
neuro suggests sim's name: Neuro suggests the name for a sim
neuro threatens sim: Neuro threatens a sm in some way
neuro mentions vedal unprompted: Neuro mentions Vedal, her creator, unprompted. If a sim is named Vedal, she must have mentioned Vedal when the sim is not currently of focus
neuro mentions evil unprompted: Neuro mentions Evil, her sister, unprompted. If a sim is named Evil, she must have mentioned Evil when the sim is not currently of focus
neuro argues with mega: Neuro arues with Megalodon over something
neuro hates sim: Neuro declares that she hates a specific sim for some reason
